name: Rock Paper Scissors 2!
description:
Game made for the Games 2 Jam.

Rock Paper Scissors is old, and boring! RPS 2 is a high octane extreme sport videogame where you either win, or you DIE!

Coding, design, environment: David Rodríguez @kenshod

Modeling, texturing, character design, dialogue, sound: @RebsParks

Music from Freesound by these lovely people: Dneproman, Snapper4298, bone666138, michorvath, CadereSounds, Rootsmessenger, furbyguy, reasanka
